text: Arau tomaloke akanksa nakaraiba se'ibora bastura yara dbaraa allahe tomalokara ejanaka anajanara oparata sraesthatba pradana karaiche. Purause yi arjana karae seya tara praapya ansa arau naraiye yi arjana karae seya ta'ira praapya ansa; arau allahara ocarata te'omra anugraha praarthana karaa, niscaya allaha sakalo bastu samparke sarbajna
